prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

During the current economic crisis, there has been an increase in fraudulent and health-damaging jewelry on the market. Customers of Korálky Katlas have reported issues and scams both in the Czech Republic and internationally. In response, Korálky Katlas has compiled a summary of key things to watch out for when purchasing ready-made jewelry and jewelry components.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: economic crisis, fraudulent jewelry, health-damaging jewelry, market, Korálky Katlas, customers, issues, scams, Czech Republic, internationally, summary, ready-made jewelry, jewelry components
